name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are small, curious, and inventive, known for their lively spirits and love of nature and artifice. They have an innate connection to magic and a deep-seated curiosity about the world. Gnomes are also incredibly resourceful and often live in secluded woodland burrows or bustling cities, where they can tinker and create to their heartâ€™s content.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gnomish.
special: Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.
